page.title: 16Day centre
page.content: then we asked them some questions. The best bit came when they gave us a drink and a biscuit each. After we had finished we walked back to school. One Wednesday in the holiday I asked a blind lady why she was not there when I went with school. Most of the people there said it was a very enjoyable place. I would have thought it would have been. The oldest lady there is Aunt Lizzy with an age of ninetyfour years old. There are two play groups in Hutton Rudby. One in Church House and one in the Village Hall. The Village Hall play group is on the days Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Friday. Dance class is on Wednesday. First is tap and we have to wear special shoes and when we are coming in it sounds like a herd of horses with new shoes on a stone road.
